sys_hub_flow.name: Service Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: wait until COR assigns the task to themselves
notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
POC must approves budget & requirement from ITPM
Wait until a PMO gets assigned the request
get approval from ECC-ITPM-Support
set the RITM to close complete
Assign COR to generate a task order for the request

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"EID-DAR/COR Support","value":"59d34c811bce2490a13aecace54bcbe2"}^description=Please open a task order for this Contact Center Service Request and attach a copy to the request.
Generate a Task Order for the COR to request Vendor Implementation

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update the ITPM field on the RITM to the ITPM who approved this request
notify clients that ITPM has approved
generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Service Request^u_assignment_organization={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: get the POC and the new ITPM from the RITM
create task for ITPM to attach quote to RITM

sys_variable_value.value: Generate and attach quote to RITM

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please generate a quote to be sent to the point of contact for approval for this request.^assignment_group={"display":"ECC-ITPM-Support","value":"14dc6a201b026090a13aecace54bcba3"}^assigned_to={{f4a6a998-5628-4e90-8da7-93b24363d316.itpm}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: have ITPM close the request when vendor implementation done

sys_variable_value.value: Close the RITM for this request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Upon notification that Vendor Implementation is done, please verify completion.^assigned_to={{f4a6a998-5628-4e90-8da7-93b24363d316.itpm}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update who the COR is on the RITM
get the variables from the original request
generate a TASK for the PMO to verify the requirements of the request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please verify requirements with the client before moving on^u_assignment_organization={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: find the ITPM who approved so we can update the RITM

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: Service Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait until a PMO gets assigned the request
have ITPM close the request when vendor implementation done

sys_variable_value.value: Close the RITM for this request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Upon notification that Vendor Implementation is done, please verify completion.^assigned_to={{f4a6a998-5628-4e90-8da7-93b24363d316.itpm}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update who the COR is on the RITM
generate a TASK for the PMO to verify the requirements of the request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please verify requirements with the client before moving on^u_assignment_organization={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Service Request^u_assignment_organization={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{f255dd5e-d96f-4a62-a4b9-eaf5716726b7.record.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update the ITPM field on the RITM to the ITPM who approved this request
POC must approves budget & requirement from ITPM
create task for ITPM to attach quote to RITM

sys_variable_value.value: Generate and attach quote to RITM

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please generate a quote to be sent to the point of contact for approval for this request.^assignment_group={"display":"ECC-ITPM-Support","value":"14dc6a201b026090a13aecace54bcba3"}^assigned_to={{f4a6a998-5628-4e90-8da7-93b24363d316.itpm}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: notify clients that ITPM has approved
set the RITM to close complete
find the ITPM who approved so we can update the RITM
get the POC and the new ITPM from the RITM
wait until COR assigns the task to themselves
get the variables from the original request
get approval from ECC-ITPM-Support
Assign COR to generate a task order for the request

sys_variable_value.value: Generate a Task Order for the COR to request Vendor Implementation

assignment_group={"display":"EID-DAR/COR Support","value":"59d34c811bce2490a13aecace54bcbe2"}^description=Please open a task order for this Contact Center Service Request and attach a copy to the request.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
